Class SettingsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.search.SettingsHelper

  • public class SettingsHelper
extends Object
    Represents a helper class for accessing settings.
    Author:
    Jens Elkner

        public Map<String,IndexedSymlink> getSymlinks(String projectName)
                                       throws IOException
        Gets any mapped symlinks (after having called getSettings(String)).
        Returns:
        either a defined map or null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getTabSize

        public int getTabSize(Project proj)
               throws IOException
        Gets the persisted tabSize via getSettings(String) if available or returns the proj tabSize if available -- or zero.
        Parameters:
        proj - a defined instance or null if no project is active
        Returns:
        tabSize
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs querying the initialized reader

      • getSettings

        public IndexAnalysisSettings3 getSettings(String projectName)
                                   throws IOException
        Gets the settings for a specified project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - a defined instance or null if no project is active (or empty string to mean the same thing)
        Returns:
        a defined instance or null if none is found
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs querying the initialized reader
